thread.title: Avisynth+ stuck on previous error message
thread.title_full: Avisynth+ stuck on previous error message

author: spud101
title: Avisynth+ stuck on previous error message
text:
I have a strange problem where
[Avisynth]+ was working fine then I opened an older script in AvsPod which used Deen & received "cannot load a 32bit DLL in 64 bit Avisynth Deen.dll" error message.
Now I get that same error message everytime I try to open any script in Avisynth.
My current script is 1 line...
FFmpegSource2("c:\temp\cowboy.mp4") and I still get "cannot load a 32bit DLL in 64 bit Avisynth Deen.dll" error message.
If it try to open the script in
[Virtualdub]..I also get the same error. Tried rebooting....still the same
Any idea what's happening here & how I can clear it?
Thanks
[+ Reply to Thread](newreply.php?p=2748622&noquote=1)
Results 1 to 3 of 3
Thread
-
-
Avs+ is trying to autoload the x86 Deen.dll from the x64 plugins folder.
Delete the .dll , or move it to another folder
-
Yes. thank you.
